title: Thank You, Alpha Testers! Sign-Ups Now Closed

replies.body: I was signed up for the alpha but didn't get acess yet, when should I expect to be granted acess?
Yes. Anyone who has signed up but didn't get access yet should be getting access sometime in the next 24 hrs.
via email or ?
You'll get an email!
If for some reason you forgot your email, you can still download the alpha client and login with the account you signed up with.
where do we download the client after we gain access. through the email I presume.
Yes or from the download page [here](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/client-update/download).
its been all most 24 hours now but i haven't gotten my email yet but i did sign up is there a chance that you guys wont get all the people who signed up?
OK now its been over 24 hours and i still haven't gotten it so for sure you guys are not getting everyone{{champion:32}}
everyone has been accepted now!
its about 24 hours, but i still haven't gotten my email, did u miss some?

Update 5:41pm EST Nov. 5th:
We have an update quoted below!
Also, Grumbles personally replied below as well!

Give em a shout out for their effort despite setbacks!

**Also, I finally got my access!!**
         I also found and reported my first bug under 20 minutes of being part of it all.  Wohoo!

~~Update 3:10pm EST :~~
~~I suggest we riot best we can as a diverse community across the web.~~ 
~~My course of action was reporting the 24hr post from Grumbles as wrong forum/ discussion, due to its lack of passing the truthyness test.~~

~~I think this is our best collective course of action to bring attention to riot having a rioter reported (if enough of us do it).~~

~~If you watched the video about being an early intern at Riot you know they wanted to build a dame that would suffice the crowds if all the gamers got together and rioted with keyboards and joysticks in hand demanding a better game.~~

~~Let's do this now as a cyber riot!~~

~~Follow me as I lead the charge having already reported the Grumbles 24hr post.~~

> [{quoted}](name=cCc Grumbles cCc,realm=NA,application-id=2E4zVIwd,discussion-id=AUcKBaYn,comment-id=0075,timestamp=2016-11-05T19:15:03.819+0000)
>
> Hey everyone, It's great to see the level of interest in the alpha. Yesterday I said that anyone who has signed up but didn't get access should be getting access sometime in the next 24 hrs. 
> 
> We have been working on this since yesterday morning. Unfortunately It's taking longer than anticipated to send the remaining alpha invites. If you've applied for the League client alpha and haven't yet received your email invite, this is why.  We're working through it as we speak and I apologize for the delay. Regardless, open beta is coming in a matter of weeks where everyone will be able to upgrade to the updated client without having to sign up.



{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

I know it sucks. We have been working on this since yesterday morning and we were pretty confident that it would have been done by now. 

Unfortunately It's taking longer than anticipated to send the remaining alpha invites. If you've applied for the League client alpha and haven't yet received your email invite, this is why. We're working through it as we speak and I apologize for the delay. Regardless, open beta is coming in a matter of weeks where everyone will be able to upgrade to the updated client without having to sign up.

> [{quoted}](name=cCc Grumbles cCc,realm=NA,application-id=2E4zVIwd,discussion-id=AUcKBaYn,comment-id=0003000000050004,timestamp=2016-11-05T19:24:37.340+0000)
>
> I know it sucks. We have been working on this since yesterday morning and we were pretty confident that it would have been done by now. 
> 
> Unfortunately It's taking longer than anticipated to send the remaining alpha invites. If you've applied for the League client alpha and haven't yet received your email invite, this is why. We're working through it as we speak and I apologize for the delay. Regardless, open beta is coming in a matter of weeks where everyone will be able to upgrade to the updated client without having to sign up.

we still get the access as long as we signed up for alpha right? I would hate to have to wait until beta comes out
Yes that's the plan. We've been sending new alpha invites for those that signed up but haven't gotten in yet since yesterday.

Possible to say screw the emails and just grant the access without the need to send the emails?  Or is the issue further up the line then the email aspect of it?

Cause we could quickly get over the lack of an email if the new client didn't deny our faces upon input of logon credentials.  

Not a sermon, just a thought.
The emails and the in-client pop up are automatically sent once we give access to alpha players. The issue is around making sure we're getting everyone.
Last hour!!  Getting tense on the 24hr claim being truthful or not.

For clarification, since the question and answer are kind of worded poorly due to the "yet", does this mean that if you clicked the "Join Alpha" button at any point and signed up, but weren't accepted you will get access?

Or is it that you were accepted into the alpha before the alpha ended but weren't granted access you will still get access?

If you have signed up for the alpha and haven't gottten access yet, you will have the chance to experience it before it's over. The alpha hasn't ended yet just the signups have. Once beta begins everyone will be able to upgrade without needing to sign up.

> [{quoted}](name=cCc Grumbles cCc,realm=NA,application-id=2E4zVIwd,discussion-id=AUcKBaYn,comment-id=0003000000010000,timestamp=2016-11-04T19:56:19.766+0000)
>
> If you have signed up for the alpha and haven't gottten access yet, you will have the chance to experience it before it's over. The alpha hasn't ended yet just the signups have. Once beta begins everyone will be able to upgrade without needing to sign up.

will Minimize to Tray button added to the new client?
I don't understand what does the client has to do on the Taskbar when minimized
It watches you play, it learns.

> [{quoted}](name=cCc Grumbles cCc,realm=NA,application-id=2E4zVIwd,discussion-id=AUcKBaYn,comment-id=000300000001000000000000,timestamp=2016-11-04T20:34:44.008+0000)
>
> It watches you play, it learns.

if i need to restore or maximize how do i put it back on tray?
what will the client do if i minimize it during gameplay?
Will it be the same thing like the old client?
Its just annoying

Yes currently the updated client behaves the same way as the legacy client. It will sit in the background after champ select while you play your game. The client stays open in the background so that when your game is over, you can get to end of game screen and continue playing.

> [{quoted}](name=cCc Grumbles cCc,realm=NA,application-id=2E4zVIwd,discussion-id=AUcKBaYn,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-11-04T18:48:08.255+0000)
>
> Yes. Anyone who has signed up but didn't get access yet should be getting access sometime in the next 24 hrs.

The wait is real. Read your comment 18 hours ago. Going to have an impatient psychotic break that makes {{champion:222}}  look sane.
I WANT A LINK
http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/wiisportsresortwalkthrough/images/8/8c/SSB4_-_Link_Artwork.png/revision/latest?cb=20140414171229
[LINK!](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/client-update/download)

It is an honor to be part of this - last year when the LCU was announced I was rly rly happy and wished to be a part of that - earlier this year I checked like every day for the Sign Up - and there it was. I singed up ASAP - and then there was the waiting 1 week - 2 weeks - 3 weeks soon after that I got in. I think I was one of the first here - the boards where empty only filled with some threads where we asked if anyone got in. 

We played and we tested stuff - and send feedback. And there was change based on our feedback - it is an amazing feeling to have directly influenced some parts even just small ones. When ever I had the time I tried to  help people on the boards here.
It was and still is really fun here - the opportunity to be part of this is amazing - testing and giving feedback is fun. It let's me feel to be a bit closer to the Devs here - even tho they worked the most. 

**A Big Thank You** to the LCU Team for their hard work, and the rest of the **Testers **for giving Ideas and Feedback!
**SHOUT OUT** to T**he Rioters** hanging out in the Boards to help and letting us know that our stuff isn't ignored.

It was a cool time with you guys! See you in Open Beta soon :3

> [{quoted}](name=PaperNay,realm=EUW,application-id=2E4zVIwd,discussion-id=AUcKBaYn,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-11-04T18:43:50.066+0000)

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}} 

thanks for testing the alpha!!!

You have no idea how awesome it is to read this. We've been working on this forever and it's been exciting and intimidating sharing an unfinished alpha client with players but the reaction has been super positive and as a result I believe we have a better client. 

The work is far from over! Keep giving that sweet feedback.
How long were you guys all working on it before you opened up the alpha?
The team grew as we started production. Some members of the team have been working on it for two years.
Where do you download? :o
You should get a download link in your alpha test acceptance email but [here it is](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/client-update/download) :)

Weeping, weeping, and more weeping 

Riot please, please get these emails rolling {{item:3070}}

Well, I strongly hope that the open beta phase will make you realize that removing item sets is a terrible idea and only hurts play as a whole, especially supports. It barely matters to me how much better anything else works, if item sets are gone it's a massive downgrade for myself and many others. That said, I don't want to seem like I'm condemning the new client as a whole. Overall, it seems like a major improvement. It's just that this issue will utterly ruin it for many.
tfw no email, and you're crying {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

Hey everyone, It's great to see the level of interest in the alpha. Yesterday I said that anyone who has signed up but didn't get access should be getting access sometime in the next 24 hrs. 

We have been working on this since yesterday morning. Unfortunately It's taking longer than anticipated to send the remaining alpha invites. If you've applied for the League client alpha and haven't yet received your email invite, this is why.  We're working through it as we speak and I apologize for the delay. Regardless, open beta is coming in a matter of weeks where everyone will be able to upgrade to the updated client without having to sign up.

YAY we got an update!!!

Are rioters immune from reports or were you notified?  

Did our riot work!?!  Or is this coincidence?

Thank you so much for the update Grumbles!!  Kudos.
We've been keeping an eye on this post. I get a message for each response so fun times!
Hello, still dont have access? Are you still rolling out emails? Pls, waiting since 3 days or so. {{item:3070}} {{item:3073}}
have been up all night now and still nothin', im so sad
Same here buddy :( I've been online since 8 AM {{item:3070}}

Almost 2 days, didn't get acess yet

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
No access yet, but hope has not died!
signed up at the start yet no access yet?
Stay tuned. Additional invites haven't gone out yet.
will you let us know when they do?
